description.narrative: The country has an independent mechanism for the monitoring and defense children and adolescents rights., which contributes to Child Protection â€“ General, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020 child protection system (legal framework, justice's system and institutions) strengthened to care, monitor and protect the rights of children affected by violence, abuse, exploitation and institutionalization, as well as children in conflict with the law.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: The country has an independent mechanism for the monitoring and defense children and adolescents rights.

description.narrative: With UNICEF support, the country has an independent mechanism for the monitoring and defence of children and adolescent's rights that regularly monitors the conditions of children deprived of their liberty and issues recommendations and reports. The establishment of the office for children within the Human Rights Institution is still pending | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:31/12/2019
